text: Terrence Howard (March 11 1969) is an American actor and singer who has starred in many movies. He did Hustle & Flow and Crash (2004). His acting career began around 1992. He was born in Chicago and raised in Cleveland, Ohio. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1993 Who's the Man?
